channel.title: [Game breaking] You can't step on bugs or push/pull boxes
channel.description: This is a gamebreaking design flaw on the part of the BM Team. Expected the ability to squish cockroaches, result was the opposite. Same with pushing and pulling crates. :meh:

item.title: [Game breaking] You can't step on bugs or push/pull boxes

item.description:
This is a gamebreaking design flaw on the part of the BM Team. Expected the ability to squish cockroaches, result was the opposite. Same with pushing and pulling crates. :meh:
